meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the care and maintenance of trees.
meanings.sent1: The skilled arborist trimmed the branches carefully.
meanings.sent2: The arborist planted new trees in the park.
meanings.sent3: The arborist joked that talking to trees was part of the job description.
meanings.sent4: Watching the arborist work was like witnessing a tree whisperer in action.
meanings.sent5: The arborist's passion for trees was evident in every task.

meanings.definition: The practice of caring for and maintaining trees.
meanings.sent1: Arborist services include pruning and tree removal.
meanings.sent2: The city hired an arborist to assess the health of the oak trees.
meanings.sent3: In the world of arborists, tree hugging is a common team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: The arborist's dedication to trees was akin to a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The importance of arborist work cannot be overstated for a greener environment.
